item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.3.0.7
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.3.0.7
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 09 Jan 2020 12:45:23 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
Control Experiment.vi provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device, how the lockin is connected to the device, configures the Krohn Hite amplifier (and Pickering switch if you have one), and sets the base path for saving data.

[SweepControl.lvclass]
Sweep Control.vi: Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
Continuous B sweep.vi: For sweeping B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments.
- Lockin vs Vsg (or Vbg) (Lockin_Vsg.vi)
- Lockin vs Time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi (under development)
- IV curves (IV.vi)

Release Notes: [1.3.0.7]
- Device and User strings are written to DSC processes (configured for PPMS1, PPMS2, MNK, DR200, THz1, MFP3D, Cypher) by Control Experiment.vi
- Cryostat class is configured for:
-- PPMS1 (Magnet, Temperature)
-- PPMS2 (Magnet, Temperature, Rotator)
-- MNK (Magnet, Temperature)
-- DR200 (Magnet)
-- THz1 (Temperature)
- Transport and Sweep Control VIs save TDMS files by default
-- Use dictionaries to store intermediate values of parameters before saving
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Instruments v1.4.0.51
item.description:
Product: Instruments v1.4.0.51
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 06 Jan 2020 17:43:24 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Abstract instrument.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.4.0.51]
This release defines several new instrument types and new abstract API methods:

Capacitance Bridge:
- Get Capacitance
- Set Capacitance

Strain Cell:
- Get Strain
- Set Strain

Optical Delay Line:
- Get Delay
- Set Delay
item.dc:creator: Levylab
